Title: Saavi: A Bonded Bride
Writer: Balwinder Singh Grewal (dialogue), Jagdish Sachdeva, Aaryan Saxena (dialogue)
Actors: Daljinder Basran, Manni Boparai, Jaspinder Cheema, Ashish Duggal
Plot: The Gaddis & some labourer families follows the Batta-Satta system of marriage in which the bride's brother has to marry the groom's sister or vice versa. Batta-Satta is a Barter marriages ...
